author: rleland
msg: Fix small typo

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the README and installation information to reflect the use of "ant"
directly, rather than the build.sh and build.bat scripts, to run Struts
builds.
Eventually, the build.sh and build.bat scripts will be removed, once we've
gained some experience with the new approach and made sure there are no
gotchas.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add support for the "dispatch via method reflection" mechanism that was
discussed on STRUTS-DEV a couple of weeks ago.  A detailed usage example
is found in the Javadoc comments of the new DispatchAction class.
This code is based on code proposed by Niall Pemberton, with the following
changes:
* Added a general-purpose configuration parameter attribute in the
ActionMapping class that implements a standard <action> element.
* Use this configuration attribute to identify the name of the request
parameter whose value will be the name of the method to be called.
* Used a request parameter (rather than extra path info) to represent
the method name, because extra path info is not available when you
are using extension mapping.
* Cached previously introspected Method objects so that the lookup
need be done only once for each method name.
* Created error responses for all possible processing problems (as well
as logging them) so that the user doesn't see just a blank page.
Submitted by:	Niall Pemberton <niall.pemberton@btInternet.com>
and many others who liked the idea (apparently I'm not quite
brilliant enough to have thought of this one :-)
